reviews.review_text:
These are phenomenal hamburgers. I certainly can't get burgers like this in Bangalore, which is why back home I usually make my own.

I'm often suspicious of gourmet burgers because they "try too hard" (my own hamburger is mayo/mustard/tomato/pickles) - but I thought I would give these guys a chance and I ordered the one with pomegranate and guacamole

The buns are perfect, when you bite into the sesame seeds you can taste the toasted sesame. The ratio of bun to meat is just right, the bun doesn't fall apart but tears just when you want it to. The beef was juicy with no gristle,  and the topping of lettuce-cabbage-tomato-onion-capsicum looked complicated but was just right.

My son got a pork burger, and I usually don't eat pork burgers but I tried his and WOW am I glad I did. This one had a little gristle but their combination of mustard and barbecue sauce was top. I took several bites before putting it down

What else... the fried pickles were cute, the chips stayed crunchy but I would have still preferred french fries. Their air conditioning was effective and the bathroom was clean

And finally, was it expensive? The burgers were around 600 each (?) which I think was justified, my son's juice was approx. 200 which I thought was overpriced, and my wife got wine which cost whatever. I mean, it was fine

This outlet has a more modern seating theme compared to the Nerul outlet. Nothing negative to say about it. The burgers were delicious, and the dip for the chips was spot on! The boozy banana milkshake is a must-try if you enjoy the taste of banana in drinks.

Burger Factory in Dona Paula offers a casual and modern dining experience ideal for any meal.

The menu features a delicious range of options, from classic beef burgers to creative vegetarian choices, with the Factory Burger standing out as a must-try.

The ingredients are fresh, the patties are juicy, and the buns are perfectly soft. Service is friendly and prompt, and the overall value is excellent for the quality provided.

Overall, Burger Factory is a top choice for burger enthusiasts.
